description:
Elevate your Nordic experience with the proven, silent Skingrip+ technology. A blend of precision engineering and the latest tech delivers performance in all snow conditions. It’s equipped with a racing base featuring additives for superior wax absorption and retention, ensuring optimal speed and glide.

  • SkinGrip+ waxless technology uses an integrated strip of skin underfoot so you don't need kick wax
  • S-cut, light carving sidecut behind the foot with a wider platform at the front for control and stability
  • Optimized camber puts the whole grip zone on the snow during kick for more manoeuverability
  • Densolite 3000 shaped foam core with fiberglass and carbon is light and responsive
  • G4 base with Zeolit additive that provides good wax absorption and retention
  • Pre-mounted Prolink Shift Bindings included
name: Salomon Escape Snow 47 eSKIN Skis + Prolink Shift Bindings - Unisex
